Default Task: Unsupervised discovery of speech features/subword units/word units
Creator: Versteegh et al.

Brief description: Multiple recordings of people with and without Parkinson's Disease.
Preprocessing: Voice features extracted, disease scored by physician using unified Parkinson's disease rating scale
Creator: B. E. Sakar et al.

Brief description: Spoken Arabic digits from 44 male and 44 female.
Creator: M. Bedda et al.

Brief description: Nine male speakers uttered two Japanese vowels successively.
Preprocessing: Applied 12-degree linear prediction analysis to it to obtain a discrete-time series with 12 cepstrum coefficients.
Creator: M. Kudo et al.

Brief description: Multiple recordings of people with and without Parkinson's Disease.
Creator: A. Tsanas et al.

Brief description: Recordings of 630 speakers of eight major dialects of American English, each reading ten phonetically rich sentences.
Preprocessing: Speech is lexically and phonemically transcribed.
Creator: J. Garofolo et al.

Brief description: A single-speaker, Modern Standard Arabic (MSA) speech corpus with phonetic and orthographic transcripts aligned to phoneme level
Preprocessing: Speech is orthographically and phonetically transcribed with stress marks.
Default Task: Speech Synthesis, Speech Recognition, Corpus Alignment, Speech Therapy, Education.
Creator: N. Halabi

Brief description: A public domain database of crowdsourced data across a wide range of dialects.
Creator: Mozilla
